Home About Services
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-topbar', templateUrl: './topbar.component.html', styleUrls: ['./topbar.component.css'], }) export class TopbarComponent { id: string = 'home'; isLoggedIn = localStorage.getItem('isAuthenticated') == 'true' ? true : false; ngOnInit() {} setId(id: any) { this.id = id; } }
